title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: Hi,Â We would like to offer our reliable and premium level offshore dedicated servers with a choice of 12 locations around the globe including Bulgaria, Ukraine, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, Romania, South Africa, Malaysia, Vietnam, Dubai, and Taiwan.We do offer premium level servers with a 24/7/365 customer support.All offshore dedicated servers include enhanced privacy, and we will never ask you for any identity documentation, and all servers are on a privacy enabled network.We are glad to offer our services to the community here as we do accept bitcoin, and we do hope that in future bitcoin gets more wider acceptance.Live chat, 24/7/365 phone and ticket support is available via our website.https://zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpIn addition to the offshore dedicated servers, we also offer domain names registration services and cPanel partnered SEO services, which you can buy using bitcoin.Thanks for your interest in our services and the post.
